sentences.en: a study of all the known facts
sentences.cn: 对所有已知事实的研究

sentences.en: Apart from vaccines, there is no known way to protect against meningitis.
sentences.cn: 除了使用疫苗外，还未发现其他预防脑膜炎的方法。

sentences.en: Duncan Campbell is nationally known for his investigative work.
sentences.cn: 邓肯·坎贝尔因其调查工作闻名全国。

sentences.en: Gifford was a friend. I'd known him for nine years.
sentences.cn: 吉福德是我的一位朋友。我和他认识9年了。

sentences.en: He became one of the best known actors of his day.
sentences.cn: 他成了他那个时期最著名的演员之一。

sentences.en: He is known for his political savvy and strong management skills.
sentences.cn: 他以睿智的政治头脑和强势的管理手腕出名。
她最后一个为人所知的地址

sentences.en: His canoes are known for their style, fine detail and craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 他的独木舟以其风格独特、注重细节和做工精细著称。

sentences.en: His children's books are classics that deserve to be much better known.
sentences.cn: 他的儿童书非常经典，应该为更多人所知晓。

sentences.en: It may be a well-known fact, but I didn't know it.
sentences.cn: 这可能是人所共知的事实，但我却不知道。

sentences.en: It's still not known how many died in the volleys of gunfire.
sentences.cn: 现在还不知道有多少人在枪林弹雨中身亡。

sentences.en: James Fox is best known as the author of White Mischief.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯·福克斯以《欲望城》一书最为出名.

sentences.en: Mahler was also known for his passionate involvements outside marriage.
sentences.cn: 马勒也因为其轰轰烈烈的婚外情而出名。

sentences.en: Nothing is known as yet about what transpired at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 会上到底发生了什么现在还没人知道。

sentences.en: Subconsciously I had known that I would not be in personal danger.
sentences.cn: 我潜意识里已经知道我不会有人身危险。

sentences.en: The man was known to the police because of previous convictions.
sentences.cn: 因为有犯罪前科，警察们都认识这个人。

sentences.en: The sta-tement of total debits and credits is known as a balance.
sentences.cn: 总借记和总贷记的结算即账户余额。

sentences.en: You should also make your views known to your local MP.
sentences.cn: 你也应该让本地议员了解你的观点。

words.tran_cn: 可知的；能认识的；易知的
博学的；狡猾的；心照不宣的

phrases.tran_cn: 被认为是，被称为；以…而著称
n. 熟知的人或事；已知量

trans.tran_cn: 大家知道的，已知的，知名的，向某人作自我介绍
trans.tran_en: used about something that people know about or have discovered

trans.tran_cn: 知道( know的过去分词 )，看到过，听到过，经历过
